title: FS: N172 Old Judge ***SPOTTED TIE*** E.E. Foster (PSA 3)
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Old Judge ***SPOTTED TIE*** E.E. Foster (PSA 3)
posts.post_content:
Greetings fellow net54 members.

For sale I have a very special N172 Old Judge E.E. Foster graded PSA 3. The card is of the extremely rare "spotted tie" variety, which is amongst the most exotic and difficult to obtain Old Judge variations in existence.

If you have interest or any questions, please feel free to PM me or email me at: [url]info@t206society.com[/url].

Thank you very much for your time.

Derek
